blocks.name: ltadd1
blocks.content: Addition to both sides of 'less than'. (Contributed by NM, 12-Nov-1999.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm ltadd1(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wb(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c2), clt, co(c1, caddc, c2))))
} = {
  bitrd(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c2), clt, co(c1, caddc, c2)), wbr(co(c2, caddc, c0), clt, co(c2, caddc, c1)))
  ltadd2(c0, c1, c2)
  breq12d(co(c2, caddc, c0), clt, co(c2, caddc, c1), co(c0, caddc, c2), co(c1, caddc, c2), w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)))
  addcomd(c2, c0, w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)))
  recnd(c0, w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr))
  addcomd(c2, c1, w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)))
  recnd(c2, w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)))
  simp3(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr))
  recnd(c1, w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ltadd1(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ)→(c0[<]c1 ↔(c0[+]c2)[<](c1[+]c2)))
} = {
  bitrd((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ), c0[<]c1, (c0[+]c2)[<](c1[+]c2), (c2[+]c0)[<](c2[+]c1))
  ltadd2(c0, c1, c2)
  breq12d((c2[+]c0), clt, (c2[+]c1), (c0[+]c2), (c1[+]c2), (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ))
  addcomd(c2, c0, (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ))
  recnd(c0, (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ))
  simp1(c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ, c2 ∈ ℝ)
  addcomd(c2, c1, (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ))
  recnd(c2, (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ))
  simp3(c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ, c2 ∈ ℝ)
  recnd(c1, (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ))
  simp2(c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ, c2 ∈ ℝ)
}

blocks.name: leadd1
blocks.content: Addition to both sides of 'less than or equal to'. (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-1999.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm leadd1(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wb(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c2), cle, co(c1, caddc, c2))))
} = {
  3bitr4d(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c2), cle, co(c1, caddc, c2)), wn(wbr(c1, clt, c0)), wn(wbr(co(c1, caddc, c2), clt, co(c0, caddc, c2))))
  notbid(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(co(c1, caddc, c2), clt, co(c0, caddc, c2)))
  3com12(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wb(wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(co(c1, caddc, c2), clt, co(c0, caddc, c2))))
  ltadd1(c1, c0, c2)
  lenltd(c0, c1, w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)))
  lenltd(co(c0, caddc, c2), co(c1, caddc, c2), w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)))
  readdcld(c0, c2, w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr))
  readdcld(c1, c2, w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr))
  simp3(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr))
}

  addcomd(c0, c2, w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)))

  recnd(c2, w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)))

blocks.pretty:
thm leadd2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ)→(c0[≤]c1 ↔(c2[+]c0)[≤](c2[+]c1)))
} = {
  bitrd((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ), c0[≤]c1, (c2[+]c0)[≤](c2[+]c1), (c0[+]c2)[≤](c1[+]c2))
  leadd1(c0, c1, c2)
  breq12d((c0[+]c2), cle, (c1[+]c2), (c2[+]c0), (c2[+]c1), (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ))
  addcomd(c0, c2, (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ))
  recnd(c0, (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ))
  simp1(c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ, c2 ∈ ℝ)
  addcomd(c1, c2, (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ))
  recnd(c1, (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ))
  simp2(c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ, c2 ∈ ℝ)
  recnd(c2, (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ))
  simp3(c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ, c2 ∈ ℝ)
}

blocks.name: ltsubadd
blocks.content: 'Less than' relationship between subtraction and addition. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jan-1997.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm ltsubadd(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wb(wbr(co(c0, cmin, c1), clt, c2), wbr(c0, clt, co(c2, caddc, c1))))
} = {
  bitrd(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wbr(co(c0, cmin, c1), clt, c2), wbr(c0, clt, co(c2, caddc, c1)), wbr(co(co(c0, cmin, c1), caddc, c1), clt, co(c2, caddc, c1)))
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wb(wbr(co(c0, cmin, c1), clt, c2), wbr(co(co(c0, cmin, c1), caddc, c1), clt, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), cr), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  resubcld(c0, c1, w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)))
  simp3(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr))
  ltadd1(co(c0, cmin, c1), c2, c1)
  breq1d(co(co(c0, cmin, c1), caddc, c1), clt, co(c2, caddc, c1), c0, w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)))
  npcand(c0, c1, w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)))
  recnd(c0, w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr))
  recnd(c1, w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr))
}

thm ltaddsub(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wb(wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, c2), wbr(c0, clt, co(c2, cmin, c1))))
} = {
  con4bid(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, c2), wbr(c0, clt, co(c2, cmin, c1)))
  3bitr3rd(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wn(wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, c2)), wn(wbr(c0, clt, co(c2, cmin, c1))), wbr(co(c2, cmin, c1), cle, c0), wbr(c2, cle, co(c0, caddc, c1)))
  3com13(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wb(wbr(co(c2, cmin, c1), cle, c0), wbr(c2, cle, co(c0, caddc, c1))))
  lesubadd(c2, c1, c0)
  3com13(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wb(wbr(co(c2, cmin, c1), cle, c0), wn(wbr(c0, clt, co(c2, cmin, c1)))))
  stoic3(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c0, cr), wb(wbr(co(c2, cmin, c1), cle, c0), wn(wbr(c0, clt, co(c2, cmin, c1)))), wcel(co(c2, cmin, c1), cr))
  resubcl(c2, c1)
  lenlt(co(c2, cmin, c1), c0)
  3coml(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wb(wbr(c2, cle, co(c0, caddc, c1)), wn(wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, c2))))
  3impb(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wb(wbr(c2, cle, co(c0, caddc, c1)), wn(wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, c2))))
  sylan2(wcel(c2, cr), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wb(wbr(c2, cle, co(c0, caddc, c1)), wn(wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, c2))), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cr))
  readdcl(c0, c1)
  lenlt(c2, co(c0, caddc, c1))
}

blocks.content: Adding both sides of two 'less than or equal to' relations. (Contributed by NM, 17-Apr-2005.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm le2add(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr))), wi(wa(wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c1, cle, c3)), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), cle, co(c2, caddc, c3))))
} = {
  sylbid(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr))), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c1, cle, c3)), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), cle, co(c2, caddc, c3)), wa(wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), cle, co(c2, caddc, c1)), wbr(co(c2, caddc, c1), cle, co(c2, caddc, c3))))
  anbi12d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr))), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c1, cle, c3), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), cle, co(c2, caddc, c1)), wbr(co(c2, caddc, c1), cle, co(c2, caddc, c3)))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr))), wb(wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), cle, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  leadd1(c0, c2, c1)
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr))), wb(wbr(c1, cle, c3), wbr(co(c2, caddc, c1), cle, co(c2, caddc, c3))), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c3, cr), wcel(c2, cr))
  leadd2(c1, c3, c2)
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr))), wi(wa(wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), cle, co(c2, caddc, c1)), wbr(co(c2, caddc, c1), cle, co(c2, caddc, c3))), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), cle, co(c2, caddc, c3))), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cr), wcel(co(c2, caddc, c1), cr), wcel(co(c2, caddc, c3), cr))
  readdcld(c0, c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr))))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr)))
  readdcld(c2, c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr))))
  simplr(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr)))
  readdcld(c2, c3, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr))))
  simprl(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr))
  simprr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr))

  ltleadd(c1, c0, c3, c2)
  breqan12d(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, co(c2, caddc, c3), co(c1, caddc, c0), co(c3, caddc, c2), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr)))

  simp1(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr))

  breq2d(c0, cle, co(co(c1, cmin, c2), caddc, c2), c1, w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)))

  readdcld(c2, c0, w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)))
  lesubadd(co(c2, caddc, c0), c1, c2)

  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr)), wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), cr))

blocks.name: le2sub
blocks.content: Subtracting both sides of two 'less than or equal to' relations. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Apr-2016.)

thm wloglei(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  ⊢ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0))→ w1)
  ⊣ ((s2 = s0 ∧ s3 = s1)→(w2 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ ((s2 = s1 ∧ s3 = s0)→(w2 ↔ w3))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ⊆ ℝ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0 ∧ s0[≤]s1))→ w3)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0 ∧ s0[≤]s1))→ w1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s3, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w2)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w2)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w1)
  ⊣ d(s3, w0)
  ⊣ d(s3, w1)
} = {
  lecasei(s1, s0, (w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)), w1)
  sseldd(s1, cr, c0, (w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)))
  simprr(w0, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c0)
  sseldd(s0, cr, c0, (w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)))
  adantr(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0), c0 ⊆ ℝ)
  simprl(w0, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c0)
  vtocl2(s2, s3, s0, s1, (((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0))∧ s1[≤]s0)→ w1), (((w0 ∧(s2 ∈ c0 ∧ s3 ∈ c0))∧ s3[≤]s2)→ w2))
  vex(s0)
  vex(s1)
  imbi12d((s2 = s0 ∧ s3 = s1), ((w0 ∧(s2 ∈ c0 ∧ s3 ∈ c0))∧ s3[≤]s2), w2, ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0))∧ s1[≤]s0), w1)
  anbi12d((s2 = s0 ∧ s3 = s1), (w0 ∧(s2 ∈ c0 ∧ s3 ∈ c0)), s3[≤]s2, (w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)), s1[≤]s0)
  anbi2d((s2 = s0 ∧ s3 = s1), w0, (s2 ∈ c0 ∧ s3 ∈ c0), (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0))
  bi2anan9(s2 = s0, s3 = s1, s2 ∈ c0, s3 ∈ c0, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c0)
  eleq1w(s2, s0, c0)
  eleq1w(s3, s1, c0)
  ancoms(s2 = s0, s3 = s1, (s3[≤]s2 ↔ s1[≤]s0))
  breq12(s3, s1, s2, s0, cle)
  vtocl2(s1, s0, s2, s3, (((w0 ∧(s2 ∈ c0 ∧ s3 ∈ c0))∧ s3[≤]s2)→ w2), (((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0))∧ s0[≤]s1)→ w3))
  vex(s2)
  vex(s3)
  imbi12d((s1 = s2 ∧ s0 = s3), ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0))∧ s0[≤]s1), w3, ((w0 ∧(s2 ∈ c0 ∧ s3 ∈ c0))∧ s3[≤]s2), w2)
  anbi12d((s1 = s2 ∧ s0 = s3), (w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)), s0[≤]s1, (w0 ∧(s2 ∈ c0 ∧ s3 ∈ c0)), s3[≤]s2)
  anbi2d((s1 = s2 ∧ s0 = s3), w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0), (s2 ∈ c0 ∧ s3 ∈ c0))
  syl5bb((s1 = s2 ∧ s0 = s3), (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0), (s2 ∈ c0 ∧ s3 ∈ c0), (s1 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  ancom(s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c0)
  bi2anan9(s1 = s2, s0 = s3, s1 ∈ c0, s0 ∈ c0, s2 ∈ c0, s3 ∈ c0)
  eleq1w(s1, s2, c0)
  eleq1w(s0, s3, c0)
  ancoms(s1 = s2, s0 = s3, (s0[≤]s1 ↔ s3[≤]s2))
  breq12(s0, s3, s1, s2, cle)
  bicomd((s1 = s2 ∧ s0 = s3), w3, w2)
  syl2anb(s1 = s2, s0 = s3, (w2 ↔ w3), s2 = s1, s3 = s0)
  equcom(s1, s2)
  equcom(s0, s3)
  anassrs(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0), s0[≤]s1, w3)
  sylan2br(w0, ((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)∧ s0[≤]s1), w3, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0 ∧ s0[≤]s1))
  anassrs(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0), s0[≤]s1, w1)
  sylan2br(w0, ((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)∧ s0[≤]s1), w1, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0 ∧ s0[≤]s1))
  df-3an(s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c0, s0[≤]s1)
  diff.wi.s(s2, ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0))∧ s1[≤]s0), w1)
  diff.wa.s(s2, (w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)), s1[≤]s0)
  diff.wa.s(s2, w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0))
  diff.wa.s(s2, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, s0, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, s1, c0)
  diff.wbr.s(s2, s1, cle, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cle.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wi.s(s3, ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0))∧ s1[≤]s0), w1)
  diff.wa.s(s3, (w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)), s1[≤]s0)
  diff.wa.s(s3, w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0))
  diff.wa.s(s3, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s3, s0, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s3, s1, c0)
  diff.wbr.s(s3, s1, cle, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s1)
  diffss.ex(s3, s1)
  diff.cle.s(s3)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wi.s(s1, ((w0 ∧(s2 ∈ c0 ∧ s3 ∈ c0))∧ s3[≤]s2), w2)
  diff.wa.s(s1, (w0 ∧(s2 ∈ c0 ∧ s3 ∈ c0)), s3[≤]s2)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, (s2 ∈ c0 ∧ s3 ∈ c0))
  diff.wa.s(s1, s2 ∈ c0, s3 ∈ c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s2, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s3, c0)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, s3, cle, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s3)
  diff.cle.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.wi.s(s0, ((w0 ∧(s2 ∈ c0 ∧ s3 ∈ c0))∧ s3[≤]s2), w2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, (w0 ∧(s2 ∈ c0 ∧ s3 ∈ c0)), s3[≤]s2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, (s2 ∈ c0 ∧ s3 ∈ c0))
  diff.wa.s(s0, s2 ∈ c0, s3 ∈ c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, s2, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, s3, c0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, s3, cle, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s3)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
}

blocks.content: If the predicate ` ch ( x , y ) ` is symmetric under interchange of ` x , y ` , then "without loss of generality" we can assume that ` x <_ y ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Aug-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2014.)

thm wlogle(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), w1)
  -| wi(wa(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s3), cv(s1))), wb(w2, w1))
  -| wi(wa(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s3), cv(s0))), wb(w2, w3))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wb(w1, w3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1)))), w1)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w2)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w1)
  -| diffsw(s3, w0)
  -| diffsw(s3, w1)
} = {
  wloglei(s0, s1, s2, s3, c0, w0, w1, w2, w3)
  mpbid(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1)))), w3, w1)
  3adantr3(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1)), wb(w1, w3))
}

blocks.name: lesub3d
blocks.content: The result of subtracting a number less than or equal to an intermediate number from a number greater than or equal to a third number increased by the intermediate number is greater than or equal to the third number. (Contributed by AV, 13-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm lesub3d(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, cmin, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(co(c3, caddc, c0), cle, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c2, cle, c3))
} = {
  mpbid(w0, wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, cmin, c2)), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c2), cle, c1))
  letrd(co(c0, caddc, c2), c1, co(c3, caddc, c0), w0)
  readdcld(c0, c2, w0)
  readdcld(c3, c0, w0)
  eqbrtrd(co(c0, caddc, c2), cle, co(c3, caddc, c0), co(c2, caddc, c0), w0)
  addcomd(c0, c2, w0)
  recnd(c0, w0)
  recnd(c2, w0)
  leadd1dd(c2, c0, c3, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wb(wbr(co(c0, caddc, c2), cle, c1), wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, cmin, c2))), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  leaddsub(c0, c2, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lesub3d(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[≤](c1[-]c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c3[+]c0)[≤]c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2[≤]c3)
} = {
  mpbid(w0, c0[≤](c1[-]c2), (c0[+]c2)[≤]c1)
  letrd((c0[+]c2), c1, (c3[+]c0), w0)
  readdcld(c0, c2, w0)
  readdcld(c3, c0, w0)
  eqbrtrd((c0[+]c2), cle, (c3[+]c0), (c2[+]c0), w0)
  addcomd(c0, c2, w0)
  recnd(c0, w0)
  recnd(c2, w0)
  leadd1dd(c2, c0, c3, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, ((c0[+]c2)[≤]c1 ↔ c0[≤](c1[-]c2)), c0 ∈ ℝ, c2 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ)
  leaddsub(c0, c2, c1)
}
